title: Road to a Brighter Future: Pacers, Suns, and Pelicans Offseason Moves | Group Chat
description:
J. Kyle Mann joins Justin, Rob, and Tjarks to talk about the offseason for a few of the more underappreciated teams, including the Pacers’ new head coach, Nate Bjorkgren, and Oladipo’s future with the team, the Suns’ draft pick and offseason moves, and the Pelicans’ trade potential. 

Hosts: Justin Verrier, Rob Mahoney, and Jonathan Tjarks

Guest: J. Kyle Mann
